alert.note: Alert for Butler; Conecuh; Covington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 6:17PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Butler, east central Conecuh and northwestern Covington Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 616 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 5 miles southwest of McKenzie, or 10 miles northeast of Evergreen, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... McKenzie and Red Level. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
